text: <https://twitter.com/spenley/status/1352363618986242057|https://twitter.com/spenley/status/1352363618986242057> the century is 0-based while all the rest is 1-based? The funny bit is that time is really an offset, it should be 0-based (just confirming that we mix the two indexings all over the place)
